common.unknownerror: Sorry, we encountered an unknown error.

register.infoline: LibreOne allows you to access all LibreTexts applications with just one login.
register.legalnotice: By registering with LibreTexts, you agree to our {privpolicy} and {tos}.
register.accountexists: Oops, an account with that email already exists. Please {signin} or {resetpassword}.
register.verify_message: We just sent a six-digit verification code to {email}. Please enter the code here to finish registering. If you did not receive a code, please check your spam folder.
register.verify_invalid: Invalid code, please check your input.
register.verify_thanks: Thanks for helping to keep our community safe!

complete_registration_name.updatelater: You can always update this information later.

complete_registration_role.tagline: What kind of user are you?
complete_registration_role.changelater: (Don't worry, you can change this later.)
complete_registration_role.student_user: I'm a Student or other Reader
complete_registration_role.instructor_info: If you're a Teaching/Research Assistant or otherwise working with an instructor, you can also use the Instructor option.

complete_registration_org.tagline: What institution/organization are you part of?
complete_registration_org.tagline_note: This will help us to better tailor your LibreTexts experience. Select your primary institution; if you're involved with multiple, you can add them later.
complete_registration_org.results_live: Results will update as you type.

complete_registration_student.tagline_note: This will help us to better tailor your LibreTexts experience. This data is protected and never shared.

complete_registration_timezone.tagline_note: This will help us to better tailor your LibreTexts experience. This data is not used for tracking purposes.

registration_complete.tagline: Thanks for sticking with us. Now, let's get you on your way.
registration_complete.instructor_guide: You can now use Conductor to complete your Instructor Profile. This will allow LibreTexts to verify your status as an instructor and give you advanced access to our services.

passwordrecovery.forgottagline: No worries, just enter your email to receive a reset link.
passwordrecovery.sentmessage: Great! A reset link will be sent to {email} if it's registered for a LibreOne account. If you don't receive an email, please check your spam folder.
passwordrecovery.expiredmessage: Your reset token appears to have expired. Please {startreset}
passwordrecovery.completedtagline: Nice! You can now log in to LibreTexts services using the password you just set.
passwordrecovery.redirecting: We're redirecting you to the login screen.

launchpad_auth.yourlibreversetagline: Access all of your LibreTexts applications from one place.
launchpad_auth.libraryeditrequest: All accounts have access to view the LibreTexts libraries. Instructors who wish to create or edit content on the libraries may need to {requestaccesslink}
launchpad_auth.libraryeditinfo: Libraries you have edit access to will be denoted with a key icon.
launchpad_auth.not_integrated_apps: Applications with a tool icon have not yet been integrated with LibreOne sign-on.

launchpad_unauth.libraryeditrequest: A LibreOne account is not required to view library content. Instructors who wish to create or edit content on the libraries may need to {requestaccesslink}

profile.infoline: Manage your LibreOne Account details here. Changes to your account here will be reflected across all LibreTexts services.

security.infoline: Manage your security settings here. Changes to your account here will be reflected across all LibreTexts services.
security.verify_message: We just sent a six-digit verification code to your new email. Please enter the code here to finish changing your email address. If you did not receive a code, please check your spam folder.
security.newemailexists: Oops, an account with that email already exists. Please try again.
security.newemailerror: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again.
security.newemailsuccess: Great! Your email address has been updated.
security.newemailinvalid: Oops, that doesn't look like a valid email address. Please try again.
security.verifyinvalid: Invalid code, please check your input.
security.passwordupdatefailed: Password update failed. Please check your current password and try again.
security.cannotbecurrent: New password cannot be the same as the current password.
security.redirecting: We're redirecting you back to the security management page...
security.external: It looks like you're using an external login provider. You can change your email or password with them.

instructor.yourprofiletagline: Verified instructors can edit and contribute to the LibreTexts libraries.
instructor.status_not_attempted_desc: You have not yet attempted to verify your instructor status.
instructor.status_pending_desc: Your instructor verification is pending. You will be notified by email when your request has been reviewed. This may take up to 48 hours.
instructor.status_needs_review_desc: Oops, it looks like we didn't have enough information to complete your verification. Please resubmit your information.
instructor.status_verified_desc: You're all set. Your instructor status has been verified.
instructor.status_denied_desc: Oops, it looks like we couldn't verify your instructor status. Please resubmit your information.
instructor.startrequestcta: Click the button below to start the instructor verification process.
instructor.biourl_desc: To verify instructor status you must provide a link to a web page showing your faculty status. Links to your institution's web page are NOT sufficient. A URL that shows that you are an instructor is needed.
instructor.biourl_invalid: Invalid Bio URL, please check your input.
instructor.registrationcode_desc: If you have were provided a registration code, enter it here. This is not required.
instructor.applications_desc: Select any LibreTexts applications you would initially like access to. You may request more applications later.
instructor.special_libraries_desc: Verified instructors automatically receive edit access to the core libraries. You may request access to special libraries below.
instructor.apps_or_libs_invalid: You must select at least one application or special library.
instructor.one_app_or_lib: You must select at least one application or special library.

instructor_getting_started.infoline: Learn how to use the LibreTexts libraries and applications. Here are some tutorials to get you started.
